articles.title: Video: Texas woman speaks out after being forced to carry her dead fetus for 2 weeks - CNN Video
articles.description: The same surgical procedure that is used to treat a miscarriage is also used for terminating pregnancies. New Texas anti-abortion laws have doctors nervous to perform procedures for miscarriages, forcing this woman to carry her dead fetus in her womb for two …

articles.author: Amanda Jackson and Caroll Alvarado, CNN
articles.title: Michigan medical students walk out of induction ceremony to protest keynote speaker with anti-abortion views
articles.description: Dozens of incoming University of Michigan medical students walked out of their medical school induction ceremony Sunday to protest a keynote speaker with anti-abortion views.

articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: The inside story of how John Roberts failed to save abortion rights
articles.description: It appears unlikely that Roberts' best prospect -- Justice Brett Kavanaugh -- was ever close to switching his earlier vote.

articles.author: Rachel Fadem, CNN
articles.title: 6 facts you might not have learned in sex ed
articles.description: Traditional sex education in the US is not comprehensive. Here are some things you may not have learned in school.

articles.author: Stephen Collinson, Caitlin Hu and Shelby Rose, CNN
articles.title: 'No more feebleness': Pelosi in showdown with Beijing over potential Taiwan visit
articles.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi is not easily intimidated. And she has a long record of taking on China. So her current showdown with Beijing over a proposed visit to Taiwan is long in the making.

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, Chandelis Duster and Laura Ly, CNN
articles.title: Indiana Legislature convenes special session to consider abortion ban
articles.description: Indiana lawmakers reconvened on Monday to consider more restrictions on abortion, the first state to hold a special session with the goal of potentially curtailing abortion rights since the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade last month.

articles.title: Pence's former chief of staff Marc Short appears before January 6 grand jury
articles.description: Marc Short, the former chief of staff to Vice President Mike Pence, confirmed Monday that he testified last week in front of a grand jury investigating the January 6, 2021, attack on the US Capitol in Washington, DC.

articles.author: Faith Karimi, CNN
articles.title: Some people in the US are rushing to get sterilized after the Roe v. Wade ruling
articles.description: In the wake of the reversal of the federal right to an abortion, gynecologists say they have seen an increase in women and non-binary people requesting tubal ligation -- more commonly referred to as tying tubes.
